Description:
Our Mission is to Simplify Life. We are looking to Simplify and automate complex decision-making for customer-centric industries, like Utilities, Financial Services, Logistics, and commerce. We are trying to solve huge challenges in today's enterprise that are directly impacting the employee and customer experience.As the MiCustomer UI designer, you will be working with customers to understand real requirements from a UI point of view, defining potential UI changes from experience, prototyping quick mockups for any initial design, getting customer feedback to iterate, and designing high-quality UI according to modern design principles.Job Responsibilities:Translate concepts into user flows, wireframes, mockups and prototypes that lead to intuitive user experiences
Identify design problems and devise elegant solutions
Ensure a standard of style, typography, colors, and imagery is maintained
Design mockups that will serve as prototypes for sales demos of the MiCustomer product
Take a user-centered design approach and rapidly test and iterate your designs
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Create prototypes for testing to ensure the design meets business and user objectives
Recommend user experience improvement opportunities 
Design UI elements such as input controls, navigational components and informational components
Design UI following industry best practices that applies under the Avertra’s methodology
Assist with managing multiple projects under tight deadlines across a broad variety of product categories and audiences
Keep the line of products design’s consistent and up-to-date
Investigate and keep himself/herself up-to-date with new tendencies and practices
Support the company’s departments in UI efforts
Work with UI developers during construction/code of User Interface to ensure the design is as developed as plannedSkills

You’ll join a global family of people working together to build an ecosystem committed to using logic to create a better experience.
We want you to help us become better. You will be empowered to drive change and innovate.
